#DeFi is a very powerful concept that has the potential to be transformative in governance and economically exothermic.

 It could change everything.

The¬†#BAPES project is boldy going where no #NFT project has gone before - launching us into this future with an intriguing vision of a decentralized member-owned investment fund empowering crypto-native founders and start-ups.

The exponential power of information technology continues to transform our world with increasingly accessible technologies empowering a new era of entrepreneurship. 

Decentralized finance and governance is shaping our human future in ways we are only starting to grasp.

I had no doubt.

We need more music in space and more space in music.
